comments.num_outs: Number of output files to generate (can inherently limit num_workers)
comments.num_workers: How many file generators to create (these directly create the data output files)
comments.out_base: The base name for output files (e.g. words -> words_1.txt)
comments.search_seed: Rand seed to find new words
comments.special_count: how many space+ character to add between words (including newline)
comments.words_per_par: The number of words to put in a given paragraph
comments.words_per_sen: The number of words before adding a period
